reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 19

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 19

bcl:section.bcl:text: Transfers to Kitselas Development Corporation, Inc. No. BC 0346989, of the properties described below are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Block A, District Lot 5153, Range 5, Coast District, PID 029-350-662;
Block A, District Lot 833, Range 5, Coast District, PID 029-350-689;
Block A, District Lot 834, Range 5, Coast District, PID 029-350-697;
Block A, District Lot 984, Range 5, Coast District, PID 029-350-701;
Block C, District Lot 5146, Range 5, Coast District, PID 029-350-654;
Block A, District Lot 6261, Range 5, Coast District, PID 029-350-671.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to July 8, 2014, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37]
